shapes

Class Snowball

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      • javax.media.j3d.Node
        • javax.media.j3d.Leaf
          • javax.media.j3d.Shape3D
            • shapes.Snowball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    shapes.Collidable, shapes.Drawable

    public class Snowball
extends javax.media.j3d.Shape3D
implements shapes.Collidable
    This class represents a snowball, a jumping and rolling object that interacts with obstacles.
    Version:
    05.23.2016
    Author:
    Michelle Z. and Waveley Q.

        z - z-coordinate of the Snowball's bottom point

      • act

        public void act(shapes.Path path)
        Gets called repeatedly to move the snowball according to the current velocities within the bounds of the game. Also controls the snowball's size over time and handles collisions.
        Parameters:
        path - the Path on which the snowball is operating on.
